name: Influence-Plus
description: Try out the all new app for Instagrammers, influencers and companies!   - Influence-Plus connects influencers with companies and like-minded users -   Made for influencers  Register now as an influencer at Influence-Plus and enter a world of international collaborations with a colorful variety of interesting companies!  You are looking for other users to connect with, to repost your pictures or simply to exchange? Try out our new Socializing function and get in touch with people like you!   You always wanted to know the perfect time for your next post and how to grow your number of followers? Calculate your individual best posting times and receive valuable tips in our guidelines!   Designed for professionals  Searching for influencers for your next campaign? Register as company free of charge and use our powerful search engine to find influencers matching your requirements.   Save valuable time and intuitively filter for cooperative influencers and get in touch with a single click.  Fill out your Business Profile today and get in touch with passionate people, to promote your products!   Influence-Plus: For Instagrammers, influencers & companies:  - For passionate Instagrammers, bloggers, influencers - No minimum number of followers required. - Micro-Influencers & Nano-Influencers welcome! - Open for all companies: brands, startups, regional businesses, professionals - Free of charge.   Join our community.  Influence-Plus Because we enjoy.   Instagram @influence_plus Facebook @InfluencePlusOfficial Twitter @influenceplus_
